question: WhichÂ  Indian University is to set up a separate department for disability and rehabilitation studies in its campus?
explanation: The University of Mysore Academic Council has approved setting up of a separate department for disability and rehabilitation studies in its campus at Manasagangotri. Vice-Chancellor G Hemantha Kumar, said that the new department would come into effect from the next academic year. The University Syndicate had approved the proposal in August this year.
